value:
Father would have worked hard to
defend everyone too...

Magvel will persevere, so long as its
people pass down tales of Ephraim,
Eirika, and the Sacred Stones...

It's impolite to ask a woman her age.
I think you're being rude.

Sleep allows your body to be reborn
anew... Please don't hesitate to rest
when you get tired.

This stone is very important to me. It
reminds me of the memories I've
made with so many people...

I come with greetings from
$Nf...
I will remember all of you.
I'm sorry... I'm stronger than I look.
Oh no, my stone is becoming dull...
Let's continue on this path together.

I'm Myrrh, a dragon from Caer Pelyn.
I carry with me the many memories
of those I watch over in Magvel.

I used to not understand why humans
always fought each other, bringing
demons and dragons into conflict too.$k$pDid they really not wish to live in
peace? Then I realized: humans
aren't content to be led by destiny.$k$pI saw them muster their courage and
use the Sacred Stones to forge a new
future in the face of demonic threat.$k$pThey shared their strength and grief
and kindness with me. I'm proud to
call them my friends.$k$pHumans try to do as much as they
can with what little time they have.
As a dragon, I admire that.$k$pWill you also choose to fight against
fate? I will watch over you, no matter
your decision.
Yah!
Here I go!
Ugh...
It hurts...
Move, please.
That won't work.
I shall fight.
With all my strength...
I can't fight anymore...
Heehee...
I'm Myrrh. Legendary Hero? What's this all about?
Ah! So you'll tease a Hero, will you? I'm glad I'm still part of the fun.
It's a shock to be discussed in this way...a legend? Me?
Is Brother here? I would love to see him.
I would prefer not to fight, but there's something I must protect.
I'm sure Father is watching over me.
I'll always do my best to be helpful to you.
If you want.
Um... sure.
I can do that.
